{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fcst = StatsForecast(
    series,
    [adida, (ses, 0.1), (ses, 0.2), (ses, 0.3), historic_average, croston_classic],
    freq='D',
)
%time res1 = fcst.forecast(14)

    series,
    [adida, (ses, 0.1), (ses, 0.2), (ses, 0.3), historic_average, croston_classic],
    freq='D',
    n_jobs=2,
)
